function BudgetForm({defaultState},{ onUpdate }) { const [state, setState] = React.useState(defaultState); const { newIncome, newNeeds, newWants, newFinancialGoals } = state; return (

Budget Pie Chart

setState({ ...state, newIncome: Number(target.value) })} readonly class="total-input form-control" />
Percentage of allocations in your Budget
setState({ ...state, newNeeds: Number(target.value) })} readonly class="total-input form-control" />
setState({ ...state, newWants: Number(target.value) })} readonly class="total-input form-control" />
setState({ ...state, newFinancialGoals: Number(target.value) })} readonly class="total-input form-control" />
); } export default BudgetForm;
